name: personal-task-management
description: A streamlined project and task management web application

scripts.dev: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.setup:complete: npm run setup:env && npm run setup:db && cd server && npm run db:push && npm run db:generate
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
